title: 27.09.2017. Servers are bugged as hell

replies.body: They are aware of the problem just like with the Replay problems, not fixing it but aware of it.

There was a maintenance but there are still server issues, but our network team is working on it.   Keep an eye out on our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.  Eambo is also discussing this further on the[ platform reset](https://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements-en/tbyHzasZ-eune-emergency-platform-restart) post.
Just waiting for the problem to be solved... I think riot knows there is a problem and tries to fix it but doesn't know what causes it xd This is frustrating though
Now i cannot even choose myself a gamemode haha riot fix your stuff please

do u seriously think riot actually CARES about this server?
they barely pay attention to us
all they care about is making the game compatible with lcs's needs
the only server they care the most is na 
and thats because it has lcs in it
i am near getting a penalty because of this... and i hate not being able to do anything when client skips queues...... rito plz...............
